```{r}
rm(list = ls())

SAmericaLink="https://github.com/DACSS-Spatial-Data-Class/Homework1/raw/refs/heads/main/SAmerica_8858.gpkg"
library(sf)
st_layers(SAmericaLink)
```
## Reading the layers:

```{r, message=FALSE}
SAmerica <- st_read(SAmericaLink, layer = "continent")
SAmericaMobile_ddm <- st_read(SAmericaLink, layer = "mobiles_ddm")
SAmerica_psm <- st_read(SAmericaLink, layer = "mobiles_psm")

```

## Checking CRS

```{r}
st_crs(SAmerica)$epsg
```

# THE BASE
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

ggplot() + theme_light() +
  #call map
  geom_sf(data = SAmerica) + 
  # adjust datum 
  coord_sf(datum = st_crs(SAmerica)) + 
  # custom X and Y axes
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/10000, suffix = " km")) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/1000, suffix = " km")) +
  labs(x = "Easting", y = "Northing") #labels
```
# DDM - static

```{r}
plot1_a=ggplot() + theme_light() +
  #base
  geom_sf(data = SAmerica,fill="white",color="grey80") +
  # layer
  geom_sf(data=SAmericaMobile_ddm,
          alpha=0.1,#transparency
          shape=20,
          size=0.5,
          color="red")+
  coord_sf(datum = st_crs(SAmerica)) + 
  # custom X and Y axes
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/10000, suffix = " km")) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/1000, suffix = " km")) +
  labs(x = "Easting", y = "Northing") #labels

plot1_a
```
# DDM - interactive

```{r}
library(leaflet)
# needs geographic CRS
ddm_4326 <- st_transform(SAmericaMobile_ddm, crs = 4326)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # base map
  addCircleMarkers(data = ddm_4326,
                   color="red",
                   stroke=0,
                   radius = 0.01,
                   opacity = 0.1)
```

Almost the same:

```{r}
plot1_b=leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)  %>%  # names in english
  addCircleMarkers(data = ddm_4326,
                   color="red",
                   stroke=0,
                   radius = 0.01,
                   opacity = 0.1)
plot1_b
```


# PSM - static

```{r}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

plot2_a <- ggplot() +
  theme_light() +
  geom_sf(data = SAmerica, fill = "white", color = "grey80") +
  geom_sf(
    data = SAmerica_psm,
    aes(size = mobiles / 1000),  # mobiles in thousands
    shape = 20, colour = "firebrick", alpha = 0.6
  ) +
  scale_size_area(
    name = "Mobiles (Ã—1,000)",
    max_size = 12,
    breaks = c(10, 50, 100, 500),
    labels = label_number()
  ) +
  coord_sf(datum = st_crs(SAmerica)) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/10000, suffix = " km")) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/1000, suffix = " km")) +
  labs(x = "Easting", y = "Northing") +
  guides(size = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1)))

plot2_a

```

# CHORO - static

```{r}
plot3_a=ggplot() + theme_light() +
  #base
  geom_sf(data=SAmerica,
          aes(fill=mobiles_density_MB5_cat))+
  coord_sf(datum = st_crs(SAmerica)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(direction = 1,palette = 'RdBu') + 
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/10000, suffix = " km")) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = label_number(scale = 1/1000, suffix = " km")) +
  labs(x = "Easting", y = "Northing",fill="Pop Density")
  
plot3_a
  
```

# CHORO - interactive

```{r}
choro_4326 <- st_transform(SAmerica, crs = 4326)
#needed
choro_4326$mobiles_density_MB5_cat=ordered(choro_4326$mobiles_density_MB5_cat)
# First, create a color palette for your categorical variable
pal <- colorFactor(palette = "RdBu",
                   domain = choro_4326$mobiles_density_MB5_cat,
                   ordered = T,
                   reverse = F)

leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)  %>% 
  addPolygons(
    data = choro_4326,
    fillColor = ~pal(mobiles_density_MB5_cat),
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    color = "white",
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1
    ) %>%
  addLegend(
    pal = pal,
    values = choro_4326$mobiles_density_MB5_cat,
    )
```

```{r}
# Calculate the center of Africa for the home button
SAmerica_center <- st_bbox(choro_4326) %>% 
  as.vector() %>% 
  {c(mean(c(.[1], .[3])), mean(c(.[2], .[4])))}  # Calculate center coordinates


plot3_b=leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)  %>% 
addPolygons(
    data = choro_4326,
    fillColor = ~pal(mobiles_density_MB5_cat),
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    color = "white",
    weight = 1,
    opacity = 1,
    label = lapply(
      paste("<strong>", choro_4326$Country, "</strong><br>",
            "Density: ", choro_4326$mobiles_density),
      htmltools::HTML
    )
  ) %>%
  addLegend(
    pal = pal,
    values = choro_4326$mobiles_density_MB5_cat,
    opacity = 0.7,
    title = "Population Density",
    position = "bottomright"
  )%>%
  addEasyButton(
    easyButton(
      icon = "fa-home", 
      title = "Reset to South America View",
      onClick = JS(sprintf("function(btn, map){ map.setView([%f, %f], 3); }", 
                          SAmerica_center[2], SAmerica_center[1]))
    )
  )
plot3_b
```
